title: RIOT FIX PERSIDE OFFSET PLEASE
body:
So for those who are not aware of this bug, this bug is about locked screen. For fixed offset it displays your champion in the middle of the screen. For those who use preside offset (me) it displays the champ a little higher in the north side of the screen. This helps me play when I'm on red side as it enables me to be able to see the enemy side a little easier. This has been a real problem for me. This is gonna hold me back from being able to play effectively until it is resolved. 

- Many league players who experience troubles without using preside offset.

replies.body: can u not fix it in between patches. Do I have to w8 for next patch to play then?
In this case, we won't be hotfixing it. You should see a fix in 6.3.
I was so annoying at this bug :c happy to know rito is fixing this trouble.
